channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description: everytime i try to play i keep getting erorr connecting to server se5rver might be down. i start my own server and try to play and i get the same error. also, i've tried ever server thats online at the moment that doesn't require hamachi and i still get the same error. also, when i start loading moparscape, my computer starts going extra slow. my computer is usually slow, but wheni run mopar scape it goes a lot slower than usual and sometimes freezes. i really doing mind the game going slow since i'm used to it from runescape (runs extra slow on my computer like other programs that use java) and i already have the latest version of java. but i just want to be able to log on.

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @freecw freecw
item.description:
@freecw wrote:

yes, i’m sure i’m using right server and right port. and i did use start server, i click start server, then click ok, then click ener, put in pass and username, then push log in, still get error connecting to server. [br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2007, 08:43:25 AM[/size][hr]can anyone help me? i have no idea what else to try. [br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2007, 10:35:28 PM[/size][hr]i’m trying to download hamachi to see if that helps me connect better, but i can’t install it. i had hamachi before but i uninstalled it (forgot why) and now when i try to install the one i just downloaded, it says i have a previous version of hamachi, and that it will continue with update, then i click ok, and it failes. then i go to control panel, then network connections, and hamachi is there. then i try to enable it and it says connection error. so i can’t enable hamachi, i’ve tried everything, can’t get hamachi to work or moparscape.

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @freecw freecw
item.description:
@freecw wrote:

if it is how do i umblock? [br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 10:30:20 PM[/size][hr]i went to windows firwalla in control panel and under exceptions i click programs, but mparscape wasn’t under the programs, then i clicked browse but couldn’t find it because it doesn’t have a .exe, .com, .icd which are the kind of files i can put under exception. Also, when firewall blocks a program its supposed to say it, but nothing comes up when i load mparscape, so i don’ tthink its the firewall. [br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 10:42:09 PM[/size][hr]just tried top lay again, couldn’t. it loaded this time and didn’t show error can’t connect to server. but where its supposed to show rhe character, it just showed a black screen sayingloading please wait, and nothing ever happened. it took me like 15 minutes to load the game itself, then when i started my own server and logged in and when it showed the black screen i waited for like 30 minutes, just said loading please wait. i’m about to go to sleep now but i’ll try it again tomorow.

Read full topic

everytime i try to play i keep getting erorr connecting to server se5rver might be down. i start my own server and try to play and i get the same error. also, i’ve tried ever server thats online at the moment that doesn’t require hamachi and i still get the same error. also, when i start loading moparscape, my computer starts going extra slow. my computer is usually slow, but wheni run mopar scape it goes a lot slower than usual and sometimes freezes.
